job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job Description: Production Support / Application Support, Linux / Windows / SQL – Expert ; Desired Skills: SQL experts in Unix/Linux Production Support profiles. SQL is the main deciding factor Unix – 8/10 Windows – How to login, IIS, Services, Security policy, Computer management – 8/10 SQL – Strong knowledge (Writing queries, Stored procedure trouble-shooting, Statistics, DDL, DML knowledge, transact-SQL, Oracle) – 9/10 Monitoring – 8/10 Analytical – Needs to understand production issue scenarios and approach to engage and resolve – 8/10 Communication – 8/10 Good to have: Scheduling tools – 7/10 Security Certificate Management – 7/10 SFTP, SSH protocol – 7/10 Linux –Advanced SQL – Advanced Windows – Advanced Scripting (such as Shell/Perl or PowerShell) Knowledge of production application environments and components including database design and performance (such as Oracle, MS SQL); virtual servers (such as VMWare); monitoring platforms (such as Geneos); application resiliency automation; scheduling tools (such as Autosys); load balancing (such as DR pairs, CNAMES, A-Record); transmission protocols (such as SFTP, NDM); Messaging tools (such as MQ, KAFKA) BS or MS in Computer Science highly desired Service Now – a plus Investment Banking Financial Services (such as institutional markets, post trade technology, prime brokerage and fund services) a plus.
